name: TinyCarousel

arrow.description: Toggles the display of arrows, which can be always / hover / never
arrow.description_zh: 切换箭头的显示效果，该属性的可选值为 always / hover / never

autoplay.description: Whether or not to switch automatically

indicator-position.description: 指示器的位置，该属性的可选值为 outside / none
indicator-position.description_zh: 指示器的位置，该属性的可选值为 outside / none

:initial-index.description: The index of the slides that are active in the initial state, starting at 0
:initial-index.description_zh: 初始状态激活的幻灯片的索引，从 0 开始

:interval.description: The time interval between automatic switching, in milliseconds
:interval.description_zh: 自动切换的时间间隔，单位为毫秒

loop.description: Whether to cycle through the display

show-title.description: Whether or not to display the title

trigger.description: How the indicator is triggered, with an optional value of hover / click
trigger.description_zh: 指示器的触发方式，该属性的可选值为 hover / click

type.description: 走马灯的类型，该属性的可选值为 horizontal / vertical / card
type.description_zh: 走马灯的类型，该属性的可选值为 horizontal / vertical / card

events.name: change
events.description: The first parameter is the index of the current slide and the second parameter is the index of the previous slide
events.description_zh: 幻灯片切换时触发，第一个参数为当前幻灯片索引，第二个参数为上一张幻灯片索引

methods.name: setActiveItem
methods.description: Manually switch the slide, the parameter is the index of the slide to be switched, starting from 0
methods.description_zh: 手动切换幻灯片，参数为需要切换的幻灯片的索引，从 0 开始

description: 常用于一组图片或卡片轮播，当内容空间不足时，可以用走马灯的形式进行收纳，进行轮播展现。
description_zh: 常用于一组图片或卡片轮播，当内容空间不足时，可以用走马灯的形式进行收纳，进行轮播展现。
